lcn.p: It is part of the Jedi Code to live simply and keep only that which you prize highly. SW: Radio-SW: Ep5: Jedi that Was - Jedi to Be The freedom from clutter that comes from such simple living is part of what the Fourth Line of the Jedi Mantra is referring to when it says: "There is no chaos, there is harmony."
All that said - while for some people, living simply like this comes naturally - for many it is easier said than done.
Seriously -- some advice is needed on how to achieve this simplicity for those for whom it cometh not naturally.
